reviews.review_msg: Best online course taken over the summer. Learned so much about the various theories. She was caring and empathetic and the group assignments were fun to do. ALso shared a lot of information that is helpful when applying to graduate school and preparing for working in the mental health field.

Roger is a really enthusiastic professor, but I found he was a bit scattered in his "lectures." He gives you all the information you need to study for exam so very easy to get a good mark. He says it's a discussion class but he seems to do most of the talking.
